abstract.t: The Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) provides mechanisms for Path Computation Elements (PCEs) to perform path computations in response to Path Computation Clients (PCCs) requests. [I-D.ietf-pce-association-group] proposed an association mechanism for a set of LSPs. This document defines the stitching LSP association type and stitching LSP association TLV for the inter-domain scenairo.
